42.eng-name: Model Behavior of the Prophet (Kitab Al-Sunnah)

hadiths.text: Ibn ‘Awn said:If we learnt that the remark of al-Hasan would reach the extent that it has reached, we would write a book for his withdrawal and call witnesses to him; but we said: This is a remark that surprisingly came out (from him) and it will not be transmitted to others
